mapper.select: SELECT v.vid,v.`v_name`,v.v_vpath,a.`a_title`,c.`crname`,v.`v_uploadtime`,v.v_to_examine,v.v_disable,t.`t_name` FROM `videos` v INNER JOIN album a ON v.`v_aid`=a.`aid` INNER JOIN course c ON v.`v_crid`=c.`crid` INNER JOIN teachers t ON v.`v_teacherId`=t.`tid` ORDER BY v.v_to_examine,v.v_disable DESC
